title: Sterlite Power bags new orders worth Rs 1,500 cr in Q1 FY'25
description: Sterlite Power won orders worth Rs 1,500 crore in the first quarter of FY25, adding to an order book of Rs 6,560 crore. This growth was driven by high-performance, green products and specialized services. The company saw a 15% QoQ increase, aligning with India's economic outlook, according to CEO Reshu Madan.
